pages.title: Ender Toxin I Upgrade
pages.text: Allows damaging ender-based creatures like Endermen by augmenting the projectiles themselves with a sticky fluid. It also prevents Endermen and Shulkers from teleporting away when hit.

pages.title: Ender Toxin II Upgrade
pages.text: The turret will be able to damage huge ender-based creatures like the Ender Dragon due to further projectile augmentation with explosives.$(br)Coincidentally, the Wither also seems to be affected by this...$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Ender Toxin I$()
